item.title: Admin Armor[525]
item.dc:creator: @dragx55 dragx55
item.description:
@dragx55 wrote:

How do I make it that only admins may be able to wield a piece of armor or weapon? I had this piece of code working in my old 508 server but it isnâ€™t compatible with 525:

if (wearId == 6591 && p.rights < 2) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "Bitch, you are not a admin."); return; }
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 11, 2009, 11:51:49 am[/size][hr]Hello, can somebody help?
